meanings.definition: Covered or saturated with water or another liquid.
meanings.sent1: After the storm, the ground was the wettest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The wettest towel in the bathroom was left hanging to dry.
meanings.sent3: The wettest dog in the park happily shook off water on everyone nearby.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were the wettest I had ever seen, filled with tears of joy.
meanings.sent5: The wettest paint on the canvas created a beautiful watercolor effect.

meanings.definition: To make something or someone wet by applying liquid to it or them.
meanings.sent1: She wettest the cloth before wiping the table clean.
meanings.sent2: The kids love to wettest each other during water fights in summer.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally wettest his friend while watering the plants together.
meanings.sent4: The sudden rain wettest everyone caught outside without an umbrella.
meanings.sent5: The chef carefully wettest the ingredients to prepare the perfect dough.
